## <i class='fas fa-rss-square'></i> Lab News


\

<div id="demobox">

May 2022\
[Alexey Abramov MD MS](about.html#PostDocs) and [Mar Martinez Mas MS](about.html#Students) graduated <i class="fa-solid fa-user-graduate"></i> from their Columbia University masters programs.  

</div>

\


\

<div id="demobox">

May 2022\
Ferrari Lab [Surgical Residents](about.html#SurgRes) Alexey Abramov MD, Clinton Erwin MD, Dov Levine MD, and Michael Simpson MD all  presented <i class="fas fa-microphone-alt"></i> their research at the [American Association for Thoracic Surgery](https://events.aats.org/102nd-annual-meeting) 102nd Annual Meeting in Boston, MA.

</div>

\

<div id="demobox">

December 2021\
[Yingfei Xue's PhD](about.html#PostDocs) manuscript <i class="fas fa-file-alt"></i> "Age-related enhanced degeneration of bioprosthetic valves due to leaflet calcification, tissue crosslinking, and structural changes" was accepted for publication in [Cardiovascular Research](https://academic.oup.com/cardiovascres/advance-article/doi/10.1093/cvr/cvac002/6502282?login=true).

</div>

\

<div id="demobox">

December 2021\
Launched Ferrari Lab website! <i class='fas fa-wifi'></i>

</div>

\

<div id="demobox">

November 2021\
[Estibaliz Castillero PhD](about.html#Scientists) presented <i class="fas fa-microphone-alt"></i> her research on [Serotonin Transporter Deficiency Leads to a Specific Fibrotic Pattern in Valvular and Myocardial Tissue](https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/ATVBAHA.121.316111) at the [American Heart Association](https://professional.heart.org/en/meetings/scientific-sessions) annual meeting.
